item.title: 美国股市在薪资基准修订前表现低迷
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走势低迷，此前主要股指在上一交易日创下近历史收盘新高，投资者在就业率即将修正前保持谨慎。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were subdued on Tuesday after the major indexes posted near-record closing highs in the previous session and investors remained cautious ahead of an impending employment rate revision.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称丰田将整合雷克萨斯在美国的生产基地
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周二报道，面对特朗普政府征收的高额关税，丰田汽车公司将把其豪华雷克萨斯品牌汽车在美国的生产基地从两个整合为一个。【原文：Toyota Motor will consolidate production of its luxury Lexus brand cars in the United States into a single location from two in the face of high tariffs imposed by the Trump administration, the Nikkei reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国豪华汽车制造商红旗到 2028 年将在欧洲推出 15 款车型
item.description: 中国豪华汽车制造商红旗汽车周二表示，将于2028年前在欧洲25个不同市场推出15款电动和混合动力车型，同时还发布了紧凑型电动SUV EHS5。【原文：Chinese luxury automaker Hongqi said on Tuesday that it would launch 15 electric and hybrid models in Europe by 2028 across 25 different markets as it also unveiled the EHS5, a compact electric SUV.】

item.title: 意大利 Domyn 公司聘请前 BlackRock 高管领导新的金融人工智能部门
item.description: 意大利人工智能初创公司 Domyn 周二表示，该公司已任命前贝莱德（BlackRock）董事总经理斯特凡诺-帕斯夸里（Stefano Pasquali）为新成立的金融服务部门负责人。【原文：Italian AI startup Domyn has appointed former BlackRock managing director Stefano Pasquali to head its newly launched financial services division, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 默茨表示，德国未来应在汽车行业处于领先地位，而非落后地位
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）周二表示，德国应在推动电动汽车行业发展的过程中发挥带头作用，而不是冒着落后的风险，因为亚洲竞争对手和贸易壁垒使德国汽车制造商更难参与竞争。【原文：Germany should lead the charge in the sector's push towards electric mobility and not risk falling behind as Asian rivals and trade barriers make it harder for the country's automakers to compete, Chancellor Friedrich Merz said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 8 月集装箱进口增长，关税动荡令年底前景黯淡
item.description: 供应链技术提供商笛卡尔周二表示，尽管在唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易政策的不确定性影响下，来自中国和其他主要供应商的进口量出现下滑，但美国 8 月份的集装箱货物进口量仍同比增长了 1.6%。【原文：U.S. imports of containerized goods rose 1.6% year-over-year in August, even as volume from China and other key suppliers tumbled amid uncertainty over President Donald Trump's trade policy, supply chain technology provider Descartes said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，温克艾沃斯创办的加密货币交易所 Gemini 寻求纳斯达克作为战略投资者
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，卡梅隆-温克莱沃斯（Cameron Winklevoss）和泰勒-温克莱沃斯（Tyler Winklevoss）创办的加密货币交易所双子座空间站（Gemini Space Station）已获得纳斯达克作为战略投资者，本周将在纽约上市。【原文：Gemini Space Station, the cryptocurrency exchange founded by Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, has secured Nasdaq as a strategic investor as it moves forward with plans for a New York listing this week, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国制裁缅甸和柬埔寨价值数十亿美元的网络诈骗网络
item.description: 根据美国财政部的一份声明，美国周二对缅甸和柬埔寨的网络诈骗运营商实施制裁，美国称这一蓬勃发展的行业去年从美国人手中窃取了数百亿美元。【原文：The United States imposed sanctions on cyber scam operators in Myanmar and Cambodia on Tuesday, a booming industry the U.S. says stole tens of billions from Americans last year, according to a Treasury Department statement.】

item.title: 随着年底最后期限的临近，印度和欧盟努力缩小贸易谈判中的差距
item.description: 印度政府和欧盟消息人士称，印度和欧盟本周将在新德里举行可能具有决定性意义的贸易谈判，寻求解决在农业、乳制品和非关税壁垒方面的分歧，以在雄心勃勃的年底最后期限前达成协议。【原文：India and the European Union are holding potentially decisive trade negotiations in New Delhi this week, seeking to resolve differences over agriculture, dairy and non-tariff barriers to meet an ambitious end of year deadline for a deal, Indian government and EU sources said.】

item.title: 关税生效后，8月份越南对美国出口和从中国进口均下降
item.description: 本周二，越南海关数据显示，由于对运往美国的货物征收 20% 的关税生效，8 月份越南对美国的出口额比 7 月份下降了 2%，降至 139.4 亿美元。【原文：Vietnam's exports to the United States fell 2% in August from July to $13.94 billion, Vietnamese customs data showed on Tuesday, as a tariff of 20% on shipments to the United States took effect.】

item.title: 韩国金融科技公司 Toss 计划从澳大利亚开始向全球推广，目标是发行韩元稳定币
item.description: 韩国金融科技独角兽公司Toss创始人兼首席执行官李承郡（Lee Seung-gun）表示，Toss计划今年在澳大利亚推出其 "一体化 "金融应用程序，并向其他市场扩张。【原文：South Korean fintech unicorn Toss plans to launch its "all-in-one" finance app in Australia this year and expand to other markets, and aims to issue a won-based stablecoin once regulations allow, said founder and CEO Lee Seung-gun.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，福特将因后视摄像头故障在美国召回近 150 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，由于后视摄像头问题导致图像倒置、扭曲或空白，增加了车祸风险，福特将在美国召回145.6417万辆汽车。【原文：Ford is recalling 1,456,417 vehicles in the U.S. due to a rear-view camera issue causing inverted, distorted, or blank image, increasing the risk of a crash, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国指控迪奥上海分公司非法转移数据
item.description: 中国公安部周二表示，迪奥上海分公司将客户的个人数据非法转移到法国总部，导致五月份的数据泄露事件。【原文：Dior's Shanghai branch has transferred customers' personal data to its headquarters in France illegally, leading to a data leak in May, China's public security authority said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Blackstone 旗下西班牙博彩公司 Cirsa 受汇率波动影响
item.description: 西班牙博彩公司 Cirsa 周二称，由于赌场业务受到所谓 "异常不利 "的外汇影响，其第二季度净利润下降了 11%。【原文：Spanish gambling company Cirsa said on Tuesday its second quarter net profit fell 11%, as its casino business was hit by what it called an "unusually adverse" foreign exchange effect.】

item.title: 英美资源集团将与加拿大泰克资源公司合并，交易金额达 500 亿美元
item.description: 英美资源集团周二表示，它已同意与泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）合并，在合并后的新公司英泰克中，英美资源集团将持有约 62.4% 的股份，而加拿大矿业公司将持有 37.6% 的股份。【原文：Anglo American said on Tuesday it has agreed to merge with Teck Resources , in which the London-listed miner will own about 62.4% and the Canadian miner will hold 37.6% of the newly combined company, Anglo Teck.】

item.title: 聚焦：工人称韩国公司在现代突袭前被警告美国签证有问题
item.description: 据工人、官员和律师称，在上周对现代汽车公司的一处工地进行突击检查之前，许多韩国工人尽管心存疑虑，并警告美国将采取更严格的移民执法措施，但仍持可疑证件被送往美国。【原文：Many South Korean workers were sent to the U.S. on questionable documents despite their misgivings and warnings about stricter U.S. immigration enforcement before last week's raid on a Hyundai site, according to workers, officials and lawyers.】

item.title: 奥托昆普与波士顿金属公司签署谅解备忘录，加强无碳金属的生产
item.description: 芬兰钢铁制造商奥托昆普公司（Outokumpu）周二表示，该公司已与美国波士顿金属公司（Boston Metal）签署了一份谅解备忘录，以加强关键无碳金属的生产。【原文：Finnish steelmaker Outokumpu said on Tuesday that it had signed a memorandum of understanding with U.S.-based Boston Metal to enhance the production of critical carbon-free metals.】

item.title: 卖空者的押注给即将上任的开云集团首席执行官带来压力
item.description: 路透社查阅的数据显示，卖空者对开云集团下了十多年来最大的赌注，这给即将上任的首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）增加了压力，迫使他恢复人们对这家法国奢侈品集团财务状况的信心。【原文：Short sellers have made their biggest bets in more than a decade against Kering , data reviewed by Reuters shows, adding to the pressure on incoming CEO Luca de Meo to restore confidence in the French luxury group's finances.】

item.title: 石场离任让日本央行暂缓加息步伐
item.description: 下个月日本将任命新首相，这可能会让央行有更多理由放慢下一次加息的步伐，尤其是如果下一任领导人不愿看到借贷成本过快上升的话。【原文：The appointment of a new Japanese prime minister next month could give the central bank more reasons to go slow on its next interest rate hike, especially if the next leader is wary of seeing borrowing costs rise too quickly.】

item.title: 墨西哥 2026 年预算赤字将随着经济增长而减少
item.description: 墨西哥财政部周一在政府预算提案中表示，随着国内生产总值（GDP）增长速度的加快，墨西哥预计 2026 年的预算赤字将小幅下降至 4.10%。【原文：Mexico expects its budget deficit to fall slightly in 2026 to 4.10%, as GDP growth is seen ticking up, the finance ministry said on Monday in the government's budget proposal.】

item.title: Permira 和 Blackstone 以 5.25 亿美元收购迪拜 Property Finder 少数股权
item.description: 根据周二的一份联合声明，Permira 和 Blackstone Inc 将以 5.25 亿美元收购总部位于迪拜的分类信息公司 Property Finder 的少数股权，这表明投资者对迪拜房地产市场的持续青睐。【原文：Permira and Blackstone Inc are acquiring a $525 million minority stake in Dubai-based classifieds firm Property Finder, according to a joint statement on Tuesday, in a sign of continued investor appetite in the emirate's real estate market.】

item.title: 诺华将以 14 亿美元收购电气石生物公司
item.description: 瑞士制药巨头诺华公司周二表示，将以每股 48 美元的价格收购电气石生物公司（Tourmaline Bio），按全面摊薄计算，这家总部位于纽约的生物制药公司的估值为 14 亿美元。【原文：Novartis will acquire Tourmaline Bio for $48 per share, valuing the New York-based biopharmaceutical company at $1.4 billion on a fully diluted basis, the Swiss pharma giant said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 航运业高管称，2030 年后船用替代燃料将加速普及
item.description: 航运业高管周二在新加坡举行的 APPEC 会议上表示，随着更严格的排放标准生效，2030 年后航运业将加速使用替代燃料，这与目前的停启过渡形成鲜明对比。【原文：The use of alternative fuels in shipping will accelerate after 2030 as tighter emissions standards come into effect, in contrast to the stop-start transition for now, shipping executives told the APPEC conference in Singapore on Tuesday.】

item.title: Mistral AI 融资 17 亿欧元，ASML 成为其第一大股东
item.description: 法国人工智能初创公司 Mistral AI 周二表示，该公司在最新一轮融资中筹集了 17 亿欧元（约合 20 亿美元），领投方为荷兰芯片设备制造商 ASML，这证实了路透社周日的报道。【原文：French artificial intelligence startup Mistral AI has raised 1.7 billion euros ($2 billion) in its latest funding round led by Dutch chip equipment maker ASML , the companies said on Tuesday, confirming a Reuters report from Sunday.】

item.title: 首尔称韩国与美国的贸易谈判因外汇问题陷入僵局
item.description: 韩国总统府一位高级官员周二表示，由于外汇问题，韩国就美国贸易协议的谈判被搁置，首尔已要求华盛顿帮助找到一种方法，以限制一项价值 3500 亿美元的投资计划对市场造成的任何影响。【原文：South Korea's negotiations to finalise a U.S. trade deal are being held up due to foreign exchange issues and Seoul has asked Washington to help find a way to cap any market impact from a $350 billion investment package, a senior presidential official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 生态数据中心（EcoDataCenter）获得 6 亿欧元资金，用于扩建人工智能数据中心
item.description: 瑞典数字基础设施提供商 EcoDataCenter 周二表示，该公司已从德意志银行获得 6 亿欧元（约合 7.035 亿美元）的债务融资，用于扩建其人工智能数据中心。【原文：Swedish digital infrastructure provider EcoDataCenter has secured 600 million euros ($703.5 million) in debt financing from Deutsche Bank to expand its AI data centres, it said on Tuesday, as demand for high-performance computing surges amid the AI boom.】

item.title: 欧洲 政治动荡纷至沓来
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 美国 3 月份就业增长预计将大幅下调
item.description: 经济学家们预测，美国政府周二公布非农就业人数初步基准估计时，美国截至 3 月份的 12 个月就业人数可能会减少多达 100 万个工作岗位。【原文：The level of U.S. employment for the 12 months through March could be slashed by as many as one million jobs when the government publishes its preliminary nonfarm payrolls benchmark estimate on Tuesday, economists predicted.】

item.title: 高管警告：美国关税加剧石化行业的挑战
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）的一位高管周二在新加坡举行的APPEC会议上表示，美国的关税正在给本已面临挑战的石化行业带来越来越大的压力，并可能导致全球石化贸易下降15%。【原文：U.S. tariffs are increasingly pressuring the already challenged petrochemicals sector and could lead to a 15% drop in the global petrochemical trade, a TotalEnergies executive told the APPEC conference in Singapore on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储宽松前景压倒政治不确定性，股市上涨
item.description: 受美国最早将于下周降息的预期提振，亚洲股市周二上涨，尽管全球各地的政治动荡仍令货币和债券投资者惶恐不安。【原文：Asia stocks rose on Tuesday, buoyed by expectations of a U.S. rate cut as early as next week, even as political upheavals around the world kept currency and bond investors on edge.】
